name: Midnight Intruder
description:
It's midnight and you spot an intruder in your house! They are shy and hide every time you point at them, and fortunately they go away after a minute. You, however, get stressed every time someone stares at you, so try to keep him hidden, otherwise who knows what might happen!

Controls:

Move - WASD or arrow keys

Point at intruder - Z, Alt or J

Cancel - X, Ctrl, K

Start - Enter

Select - Shift

This game was made with GB Studio for the Game Boy Showdown Game Jam.
